    /system identity

    # Section: interfaces (Type: interfaces)
    /interface
    # Section: ether1 (Type: custom)
    /ether1
    type="ethernet"
    admin_state="enabled"
    # Section: ip (Type: ip)
    /ip
    address="192.168.1.1/24"
    # Section: ether2 (Type: custom)
    /ether2
    type="ethernet"
    admin_state="enabled"
    description="WAN Connection"
    # Section: firewall (Type: firewall)
    /ip firewall
    # Section: filter (Type: custom)
    /filter
    # Section: input_accept_established (Type: custom)
    /input_accept_established
    chain="input"
    connection_state={"established","related"}
    action="accept"
}
